name: Mr. Kamal Panwar
qualifications: B.Tech in Electronics and Communication Engineering
experience: More than 26 years in teaching and research. Before assuming the charge of Registrar, Government Engineering College, Barmer, Rajasthan.
message: It is a matter of great pride to serve as the Registrar of our esteemed institution. With extensive experience in academic administration and a strong commitment to excellence, we ensure smooth functioning of all academic and administrative processes.
